name: Goblin
description: A small, mischievous creature.

name: Orc
description: A large, brutish monster with immense strength.

name: Troll
description: A giant with regenerative abilities.

name: Dragon
description: A fearsome, fire-breathing beast.

name: Zombie
description: An undead creature with a hunger for brains.

name: Vampire
description: A nocturnal predator with a thirst for blood.

name: Werewolf
description: A lycanthrope that transforms under the full moon.

name: Lich
description: An ancient sorcerer with dark magical powers.

name: Golem
description: A massive construct animated by magic.

name: Demon
description: A malevolent entity from another realm.

name: Minotaur
description: A beast with the body of a man and the head of a bull.

name: Harpy
description: A winged creature with sharp talons and a deadly screech.

name: Hydra
description: A multi-headed serpent that regrows heads when severed.

name: Cyclops
description: A one-eyed giant with immense strength.

name: Basilisk
description: A serpent whose gaze can turn creatures to stone.

name: Ghoul
description: A flesh-eating undead creature that lurks in graveyards.

name: Succubus
description: A seductive demon that drains the life force of its victims.

name: Manticore
description: A fearsome creature with the body of a lion, wings of a bat, and tail of a scorpion.

name: Kraken
description: A massive sea monster with tentacles capable of sinking ships.

name: Phoenix
description: A legendary bird that rises from its ashes, reborn.

name: Wendigo
description: A cannibalistic spirit with an insatiable hunger for human flesh.

name: Wyvern
description: A dragon-like creature with venomous fangs and a barbed tail.

name: Centaur
description: A warrior with the body of a horse and the torso of a human.

name: Cerberus
description: A three-headed hound that guards the gates of the underworld.

name: Behemoth
description: A colossal beast of immense power.

name: Djinn
description: A magical being capable of granting wishes, but with a malevolent twist.

name: Imp
description: A tiny, mischievous creature with fiery powers.

name: Wisp
description: A glowing, ethereal spirit with minimal physical presence.

name: Skeleton Warrior
description: A reanimated skeleton armed with a rusty sword.

name: Shade
description: A shadowy figure that strikes from the darkness.
